channel.title: [Allstar] xGlory-V1 | Friendly Community | Highscores | Webclient & more
channel.description:
Welcome to xGlory-v1 Allstar,
Hello,
My name is Rochard and I've had coded allstar servers around 2 years ago. After RS updated EoC i started thinking about leaving RS and play RSPS agian soo here I'm!
Downloads: Client:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?wyizdsk2ol5nik8]Mediafire link[/url]
Another Links: Highscore:[url=http://82.74.98.119/highscores/highscores.php]Highscores link[/url]
Please understand that server isnt perfect coded but the following updates are already done:
- Client fully updated & fixed! - All skills up to 99 with correct XP amount. - Anti Tradedupe. - Anti SYI-system - Dupes are properly fixed. - max money inv. 2147m - Our own custom Home! - Our own custom Train! - Our own custom Shops - Our own custom...(more coming) - Safe & Wild detect system - server without restarter & Full anti-null! - Quest tab full with usefull resources (currently only << rares teleport >>) - :: viewstats option to view how many rares monster killed. - Right-click update - Right-click viewstats to view another person his kills. - Friendly Community - ::players with colour legend. - 24/7 active server.
========================================= * give us a chance and see our features by using our offcial client =========================================
WHY? - view our custom colours(you will not see if you dont use.0 - view custom items(you wont see them if you dont use our client)
Thank you for reading,
Rochard(server main owner)
